item.title: U.S. Airstrikes Back Troops in Baghdad Clash
item.description: BAGHDAD, Jan. 9 -- ß With F-15 fighter jets and Apache helicopter gunships providing cover, U.S. and Iraqi troops on Tuesday battled hundreds of Sunni Arab insurgents firing from apartment buildings and houses in downtown Baghdad in one of the fiercest clashes in the capital in recent memory.
item.author: Sudarsan Raghavan and Joshua Partlow
